page.title: 08LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The area is part of the county of Greater Manchester and comprises the boroughs of Manchester and Trafford. In Stretford is a Police HQ which is a county responsibility, and a Town Hall. To the NE of Hough End playing fields are the Police stables and kennels, which are fairly new since the former premises in Moss Side were demolished through redevelopment. There is a small local police station in Chorlton. Stretford Police Station is the major station in Trafford and offers a wide range of protection services for the public, e.g. traffic control, accident and crime prevention, with the current emphasis on juvenile misuse of drugs.
